welcome.welcome: 🎉 Awesome choice! We're all set! 🚀 FluxGuard is fully charged and ready to serve! ⚡ Just tell me what you need, and I'll handle it like a pro! 💼✨ From shutting down the system to sneaking a peek at the screen 👀 or compressing files like a ninja 🥷—I'm here for it all! 🙌 So, what's the first mission, boss? 😎

status.status: 📊 Status dashboard is here! Time to check the system's health. I promise to keep it real! 🤓

apps.apps: 📂 Apps dashboard is ready! Tell me which app to manage or if you want to run a new one. Just don't make it too hard for me! 😜
apps.opened_app: 📋 I've got a list of open and controllable apps ready for you 👇 Tell me what to do, boss! 😎

send.send: 📤 Send dashboard is ready! Want to send a file, play a voice message on the system, or even display some media? I've got you covered! 🎯

file_explorer.file_explorer: 📁 File Explorer dashboard is open! Let's dig through the folders like a pro detective. Who knows, we might even find a treasure! 🕵️‍

security.security: 🛡️ Security dashboard is active! Ready to keep an eye on everything and report any threats. Like a ninja in the shadows! 🥷
